name: KEWL2
description: Hot DooM II DM! Yo guyz thiz iz a DeathMatch *ONLY* Wad. And, for 2p- DeathMatching, it's really good. I tried a lot of known excellent deathmatch WADs(the MARKRM series, LEDGES...) and I like this one, too :-) BTW, if you don't know, "kewl" is a way of writing "cool" :-) I got WadEd 1.42 with DooM II support today. So I changed a few textures&stuff, put in the SSGUN, so now my nice DooM DeathMatch WAD is playable in a much better DooM II version! Have phun... Using -altdeath is absolutely necessary!
